descriptionHtml:
[youtube]ZijnOoH9jFw[/youtube]

The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
Multi Core Shot Mod by elysees

-Powers
-Auto learn
-Select Multi Shot / Cluster Shot / Strafe Shot
-Bow Charge! > Summon Core(Launcher) & Max 12 Arrow charge > Shot !
-Damage : Archery(Marksman) Value 80% per 1 Arrow
[b]*Be careful !!! Skyrim Script Delay[/b]


::Console Command::
If you want damage edit.
` > Set multiDamageRate to 1.0
default value 1.0 (1.0=100%)



*Feel free to use everything in this file.
author: elysees
